keyMoments.title: Freed from Slavery by Trafalgar Law
keyMoments.description: Jean Bart, a former pirate captain enslaved by Saint Rosward, is freed when Trafalgar Law removes his explosive collar. He immediately accepts Law's invitation to join the Heart Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Jean Bart's debut establishes him as a new member of the Heart Pirates. His past as a famous pirate captain and current status as a freed slave adds depth to Law's crew.
keyMoments.quote: As long as it means being free from the Celestial Dragons, I'll gladly accept!

abilities.description: Jean Bart possesses great physical strength, having been a pirate captain before his enslavement.

relationships.description: Law freed Jean Bart from slavery and invited him to join the Heart Pirates. Jean Bart is deeply grateful and loyal to Law.

evolutionMoments.description: Law removes Jean Bart's slave collar and recruits him to the Heart Pirates.

reveals.information: Was a famous pirate captain before being enslaved by the Celestial Dragons
Was part of Saint Rosward's Pirate Captain Collection

keyMoments.title: First Use of Punk Gibson
keyMoments.description: Kid demonstrates his signature technique, using his magnetic powers to gather all nearby metal weapons into a massive arm construct, then crushing Marines with devastating force.
keyMoments.significance: First named technique shown by Kid, establishing his combat style and the offensive capabilities of the Jiki Jiki no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Promise to Meet in the New World
keyMoments.description: Kid declares his rivalry with Luffy and Law, warning them that he will show no mercy when they meet again in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the competitive dynamic between the three Supernova captains and foreshadows future confrontations.
keyMoments.quote: The next time we meet, no mercy will be shown.

abilities.description: Kid uses his magnetic powers to gather metal into a giant arm and crushes enemies with overwhelming force.

relationships.description: Kid views Luffy as a rival for the title of Pirate King. Despite working together against the Marines, Kid makes clear they will be enemies in the New World.

evolutionMoments.description: Kid and Luffy exchange promises to meet again in the New World as rivals.

relationships.description: Killer serves as Kid's first mate and protects him in battle.

reveals.information: First display of named technique Punk Gibson

name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Room Ability Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Law creates his signature 'Room' sphere and demonstrates his surgical powers by manipulating the Marines' body parts within the domain.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of Law's Ope Ope no Mi abilities, showcasing the tactical and versatile nature of his Devil Fruit.

keyMoments.title: Frees Jean Bart from Slavery
keyMoments.description: Law removes Jean Bart's explosive slave collar and recruits him to the Heart Pirates, showing his willingness to challenge the Celestial Dragons' authority.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's compassionate nature and his opposition to the World Government's tyranny. Establishes Jean Bart as a new crew member.

abilities.description: Law creates a spherical domain where he can manipulate anything inside, including rearranging body parts of those within.

relationships.description: Law freed Jean Bart and recruited him to the Heart Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Law removes Jean Bart's slave collar and invites him to join his crew.

reveals.information: First detailed demonstration of Room ability and surgical powers
Shows compassion by freeing slaves and opposing Celestial Dragons

keyMoments.title: Bepo's Combat Display
keyMoments.description: Bepo demonstrates his martial arts abilities by defeating Marines who attempt to attack Law, showcasing his fighting skills despite his apologetic personality.
keyMoments.significance: First significant combat scene for Bepo, establishing him as a capable fighter in Law's crew.

abilities.description: Bepo is skilled in martial arts combat, able to defeat multiple Marines.

relationships.description: Bepo serves as navigator and loyal crew member under Captain Law.

keyMoments.title: Nueve Fleur Technique
keyMoments.description: Robin debuts a new Hana Hana no Mi technique called Nueve Fleur, sprouting nine arms to restrain Marines during the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Robin's continued development of numbered flower techniques, expanding her combat abilities.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts nine arms to restrain and incapacitate enemies.

name.japanese: シルバーズ・レイリー

keyMoments.title: Reveals Roger's True History
keyMoments.description: Rayleigh discloses crucial information about Gol D. Roger: that he was Roger's vice-captain and first mate, that Roger turned himself in rather than being captured, and that Roger had a terminal illness four years before his execution.
keyMoments.significance: Major world-building revelation that reframes the entire history of the Pirate King and the beginning of the Great Pirate Age.
keyMoments.quote: Roger turned himself in to the Marines.

relationships.description: Rayleigh served as Roger's vice-captain and first mate on the Roger Pirates.

evolutionMoments.description: Rayleigh confirms his role as Roger's right-hand man.

reveals.information: Confirmed as vice-captain and first mate of the Roger Pirates
Revealed that Roger turned himself in and had a terminal illness
